com.davidbracewell.logging

Class Logger

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.davidbracewell.logging.Logger

  • public final class Logger
extends Object

    Logger wrapping the java.util.logging framework making certain operations much easier. In particular, methods such as info(String, Object...) provide easier ways to call Logger.log(Level, String, Object[]). Additionally, the level of individual loggers can be set using Config settings in the form of fully.qualified.name.level=LEVEL.

    Author:
    David B. Bracewell
